channel.title: Wu, Zhixuan on Lei Zheng
channel.description: Recent content in Wu, Zhixuan on Lei Zheng

item.title: April 2022: New journal article of IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters.
item.description: We propose a learning-based tracking control scheme based on a feedback linearization controller in which uncertain disturbances are approximated online using Gaussian Processes!

item.title: Safe Learning-Based Feedback Linearization Tracking Control for Nonlinear System with Event-Triggered Model Update
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.

item.title: April 2022: New journal article of the International Federation of Automatic Control (IFAC).
item.description: The control framework integrates a learning-based MPC with an auxiliary controller in a way of minimal intervention!

item.title: Safe learning-based gradient-free model predictive control based on cross-entropy method
item.description: Supplementary notes can be added here, including code and math.
